website_summaries.verdict: This durable play tent is made with two ports for tunnels and is suitable for outdoor or indoor use.
pros: Stronger construction than many play tents
Lots of space inside for several kids or even an adult
cons: Pay close attention to the sizing
This tent is larger than many play tents and may not fit in your space

customer_reviews.title: Her first apartment!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge! And that's why my 9 yrs niece love it. She can get in with a couple of friends, or with her parents, or simply have a camping day...in the living room with her dog and her sleeping bag. The best thing is that it has a floor. I don't know how much action it can stand since its only being in use since Christmas, but so far, so good. Has very good ventilation and is really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Thinkerball

customer_reviews.title: Best give from Grandma yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so happy with a purchase. Look at the smiles on my grandsons faces! The tent provides many different adventures for them; especially during this quarantine period. It can be their fort, a secret hideaway, a clubhouse, or even a place to take a quick nap. The tent arrived very quickly after I placed my order. It took less than 10 minutes to assemble and it is very well made and sturdy enough to endure the roughhousing of three young boys. I love the size of it. As you can, my 4-year-old, 6-year-old, and 11-year-old grandsons fit in it comfortably. Money well-spent!
customer_reviews.author: Roro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my grandsons, ages 4 and 7, so they could have a little hideaway to read their books and play in. My son-in-law said it was very easy to assemble, and the boys are in it all of the time! They have sent me pictures of them reading their books inside the tent, with pillows taking naps inside the tent... It’s their own little space and they love it! It is on the larger side, so you have to have enough space to put it up. Thankfully their bedroom is actually the master, so they had the space for it. And it’s a beautiful tent! I am so happy that I purchased this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids and durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5-yr old grandson to keep him motivated and give him something adventurous to do while we're in this pandemic. It was a hit and my daughter and son-in-law put it together in a short time. They said the assembly was easy and my grandson was already in one of his adventures reading books inside. He plans to sleep outside in the wild (the living room ha,ha,ha) Happy Grandson, Happy customer. We would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playtent for my 7 and 9 year old grandsons
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love to build 'houses' out of cardboard so I thought I would buy them this play tent. Since they are growing I ordered the larger size and it is perfect for them. It was easy to put up. Comes with a nice bag for carrying from my home to theirs and back. My 9 year old grandson can put it up (with a little help) and take it down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddlers/kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help entertain a couple of my toddler grandsons while tending them. It’s been a hit! It’s a good size and has held up quite well. Just a little challenging setting up (just one adult) - could have used an extra set of hands to position poles. Really like that it comes with a storage bag and collapses and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: nancyb

customer_reviews.title: Works great for potty training!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. My son is potty training and we put this right on top of his bed (a queen size). He is 3 years old and does not have nighttime accidents often, but when he does the waterproof floor of this tent keep the pee off of the bed. We just gather up all of the bedding and toss the whole lot in the washing machine. Put down new bedding and he can get back to sleep. Works great!. Plus it is pretty cute and he likes it. His only complaint is the crinkly floor. If you put down a blanket it doesn't bother him any more.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indoor play tent
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice, sturdy tent. It seems it would be good even for light outdoor camping. Though I would only take it outdoors if it’s not raining and there is not much chance of bugs and small animals getting inside, since the openings seal only with Velcro squares. But for indoors it’s perfect, and I love sitting in it with my daughter for storytime before bed.
customer_reviews.author: SkepticalSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to build
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for ny very active 3 year old grandson. Very easy to build , nice colors for both genders, very stable. Enough Room to put 2 crib matresses next to ach other. We put it in our basement in the playroom and he loves to run in and out the tent. I think he and his little sister will keep it for a long time. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Esther-M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had an Ozark Trail tent for my boys. It was $45 & sturdier than this tent. They broke the poles & I was trying to save a little money but purchasing this one. I’m pretty happy with it. The tunnel hole on the side & colors are what sold me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raineri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Fits older kids too!
customer_reviews.text: Great play tent and nice quality. My 10 yr old loves this and can fit a few friends and her cat inside too. Easy assembly and breakdown. Good for indoors and outdoors. Waterproof bottom. Top is a partial open screen, no extra cover included so don’t leave outside in rain!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: I like putting things together
customer_reviews.text: I like putting things together. I get excited over manuals and instruction, in figuring the ins and outs of everything during meticulous assembly. This product is NOT like that. It's insane how easy this is to put together. So although I would not have complained about a tedious assembly experience, I'm certainly not complaining about the ease either. My five year old niece was my little helper in assembling this and learned how it was put together in the four minutes it took.
customer_reviews.author: Sandah

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love the Tent
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids, ages 5 and 7, love the tent that we received today. Accommodates both comfortably along with sleeping bags, stuffed animals, tablets, and other toys. They even have a low wattage lamp hanging from the center. Took hubby only 5 minutes to put it up so assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkee

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent for kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Seems sturdy we shall see. This tent is a good size but with two kids age 6 and 8 it’s tight with sleeping bags etc. definitely not fitting adults
customer_reviews.author: CareMar

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent
customer_reviews.text: Super cute tent. Easy to assemble and perfect size for my son. Not plural. It is smaller than anticipated. Beware if it is windy at all it will pick up and leave unless you have sandbags or heavy items inside.
customer_reviews.author: Isle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Its large, super sturdy and easy to put up and take down. Poles are as sturdy as quality camping poles and bottom floor of tent is made of same material as an outdoor camping tent water proof tarp type material. my kids love this and have used it daily with no tears or breaks. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Fun little tent
customer_reviews.text: This has been fantastic for my kids. They love setting it up in the room to camp out, or in the living room and it doesn’t take up too much space. We have also taken on vacation and have them sleep in the hotel in the tent. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and easy to put together. Lots of room and my kids are going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mega reviews

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice tent. We bought it for our 5 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tent. We bought it for our 5 year old granddaughter and she plays in it, has sleepovers in it, and just flat out enjoys every aspect of it. It's very easy to put together... took only moments. Very sturdy and nice looking. No tools necessary. We've had it in our backyard, as well as in our granddaughter's room. It's easy to pick up and move, as well as fold up and store. Nice product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy play tent, nice size and colors.  Very compact when rolled up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, perfect size play tent for 1-3 kids. Does not have a rainproof top, so can only be used outdoors in clear weather. Also, no zippers, so not completely bug proof. We use this tent in our guest room for our granddaughter's sleepovers. She loves the adventure of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Contains kitty litter!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pup tent to put my cat's litter boxes in so as to keep the cats from tracking the litter into another room. It is waterproof in case the cats urinate outside the box. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mimosasilk

customer_reviews.title: Good play tent for a six year old
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small inside tent for my grandson to play in so he could "have his own space". This tent is perfect. I don't think the whole family could fit in it, as the package claims, but it is just the right size for a six year old boy, his toys and a cat or two. It is quick and easy to set up and comes with a storage bag which fits neatly on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my grandsons when they visited for three weeks. They are small for their ages, which are 8 (twins) and 5, but only the twins could fit in the tent comfortably to sleep. Still, it held up and was an inexpensive way to give them some privacy in our room.
customer_reviews.author: Sharonov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect idea for sleepovers
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and depending on which grandkids use it, it's called, "camp ______" when it's sleepover time. S huge hit
customer_reviews.author: Wasilla D&T

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old absolutely loves it and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lelina-Ford

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my five year old nephew who likes to camp out in their living room... easy to assemble and he LOVES IT
customer_reviews.author: faeryfriendz

customer_reviews.title: ... more than a month now and I am completely satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo son has been using this tent for more than a month now and I am completely satisfied with it. Well worth the price. It is sturdy (I assemble and later disassemble it each time he wishes to play in it). It is very simple to put up or take down, requiring only ~ 2-3 minutes. We have only used it indoors so far. It easily accommodates 2 adults and 1 toddler. He is happy playing in it by himself or with his friends or with me.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Kids Dream!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is SUPER easy to put together and litterlly takes 10mins tops. The size is perfect for my boys toddler mattresses. We are able to put them both inside side by side. My boys are 3 and 5 and have plenty of room. They LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Delta6of21

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute little play tent that is easy to put together and I like that it has a bottom in it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent for play
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy loves this tent. It is a favorite place for him to read books or just hang out. We connected it with another smaller tent we already had with a couple of tunnels that came with the smaller tent. He really enjoys this hideaway in his play room.
customer_reviews.author: RayH

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and so much fun for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and so much fun for my 3 year old. It is big enough for me to get in with her and play. Well make and should last. Cannot be used outside in rain though. It did not come with a rain cover like a full size tent would and it has vent mesh at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina H.

customer_reviews.title: He love very much this tent and when he played with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 5 years old grandson’s birthday. He love very much this tent and when he played with tent , always he feels happy 😊 .Easy , safety, nice color and good 🎁 gift for kids .
customer_reviews.author: SEMA TOPKARA

customer_reviews.title: Play  tent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a 2.1/2 year old grandchild. It is bright and colorful. She is loving the tent which is set up inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: garden pal

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 4 year old sons LOVE this tent. We do weekend "camp outs" in our living room and this works perfectly. They take the mattresses from their toddler beds and lay them side-by-side inside to sleep on, to give you an idea of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for in doors, easy to et up and put away. My 5 years old loves it, he slept in the tent for 2 weeks when he received it.
customer_reviews.author: bhjjlc

customer_reviews.title: Purchased it twice, broke both times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it broke within the first time putting it together and breaking it apart. I returned it and got another one and same thing happened. Such a cute tent, but not sturdy at all for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Prinnces Doniego

customer_reviews.title: Students love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom, and my students live it. Really helped foster more reading in class.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie A M

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. Exactly as it looks in picture
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Exactly as it looks in picture. Nothing more, nothing less. Fun and easy to set up & take down. The best part is being able to fit inside with my son.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent for my 9 year old daughter. She has used it outside on the deck, at the playground, in the living room and in the basement. She loves it. It holds up well. We've had it for about 5 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fun indoor/outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these tents to use as indoor reading cozys with my nieces and nephews. They loved them. The tents were so easy to assemble. The kids assisted with the assembly. I’ll be using them outdoors for a family bbq.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Larry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time in the tent. Easy and quick to assemble. Used it on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: CateW

customer_reviews.title: Prop 65 Warning
customer_reviews.text: Why does this children's tent have a Prop 65 warning on it for containing materials that may cause cancer or birth defects? Didn't see this warning anywhere in the listing but the warning is front and center when you look at the box. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sholo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and take apart - very good value and kids love it
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! So easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! So easy to set up! Get this one and not the smaller version. It fits 2 kid sleeping bags and provides hours of entertainment. Wish I'd gotten it sooner for my 5 year old and 18 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for indoors. It’s easy to assembly and has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! got it for my grandsons to play In ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT ! got it for my grandsons to play In and they LOVE it! I fit in with them!
customer_reviews.author: Karenrae Travers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the grandkids.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal for the money. The tent is sturdy and my grandkids can put it together by themselves (an added bonus)! It also provided hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mull

customer_reviews.title: Indoor play
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for a play tent. I got it so my grandsons could play inside of it on cold, snowy or rainy days. I am curious if it will hold up but I think it will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: This tent is great, but it's just too big
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great, but it's just too big. I bought this as a club house for my daughter's room for herself, her stepsister, and their dolls, but it's just so big.
customer_reviews.author: Detricia

customer_reviews.title: he loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my son for christmas and he absolutly loved it.I had to set it up in the living room after we cleaned up wrapping paper lol. He played in it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: melinda  carroll

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Great size for my 7 year old. He can hide out in it to read or sleep. It was his favorite birthday gift this year by far.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kronman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Much larger than I had envisioned although the dimensions described are correct.
customer_reviews.author: Inkii

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent for Children
customer_reviews.text: My grandnephew, 5 was thrilled with the tent, we set it up in our office with a sleeping bag, he sleep there for days, he made beleive he was camping, now travels with it where ever he goes. Easy to install, and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandson's 3rd birthday
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson's 3rd birthday! He got this and a "lantern" that lights up a starry pattern on the ceiling/leaves in a tree, etc
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Nana

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We've put this up in our living room at least 20 times since Christmas. It is well made and easy to assemble. My kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Fiina Fauth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Nice size. My kids love it. Just what I was looking for. Worth all the time I spent on Amazon comparing and reading reviews. ;)
customer_reviews.author: MTStew

customer_reviews.title: Fun tent!
customer_reviews.text: What a great tent for the kids! Perfect size for my 8 & 5 year old kiddies. I put this up in less than 10 minutes! Plus side that it has a waterproof bottom for the grass! My kids are really enjoying this right now.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this. Sturdy with lots of room, will easily fit adults and kids yet small enough to keep indoor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: grandkids love it! What more can I say
customer_reviews.text: Well made, price was right, grandkids love it! What more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cayes

customer_reviews.title: (age 5) The two year old loved playing in it during the day
customer_reviews.text: Omygosh, this tent is so cute! I bought it for my grandchildren to play in during their recent visit. We set it up in the house and one of the girls slept in it every night! (age 5) The two year old loved playing in it during the day. It was well worth the investment; we will have this tent for years for all visiting little people!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank You nice honest business who does communicate with customers.
customer_reviews.author: Toya Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My toddler love sleeping in it on the weekends
customer_reviews.text: My toddler love sleeping in it on the weekends. This tent is very spacious my older children can fit inside also.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this tent so much. My son is 5 years old. It can hold two sleeping bags
customer_reviews.author: ALEX AN

customer_reviews.title: Size is small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for three average size kids. Otherwise nice materials and bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent is great, I love that it has a floor so ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great, I love that it has a floor so we can use it outside. It's spacious and durable. We are having a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Don's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great little chat, easy portability.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to assemble. What they don’t tell you in the directions is that once it’s at seven but you can literally squeeze it to move it from room to room which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids like love it and what makes them happy makes me. Great size and quality
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Great size and value
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this. It comfortably fits two 4 years olds plus a nine year old.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this tent, so easy to take down and put up
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Esser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, its big enough for all 4 to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Lorena

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to set up & break down
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is the cutest tent. I bought it for my daughter to “camp” inside with. It’s big enough inside for her & a friend as well. She loves it! It’s easy to set up & break down, & even easier to fold up to put in the bag. I highly recommend this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Segala

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Play Tent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the money and easy to put up. Granddaughter is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Easy to set up. Can fit 3-4 small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tent is the best! My granddaughter loves it...and there is room for me too! Good ventilation with netting on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Scott

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the best tent for 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVED it, but for some reason it didn't collapse properly. It broke instead. 😕

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and my kids love it! Easy enough to set up to take down and put up regularly.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love having an indoor tent like at a hotel when they visit our home! Cute tent and lots of fun!

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for a Play Tent
customer_reviews.text: It's just as pictured. It is light-weight, easy to set up, and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: inquisitive mind

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: bought for grand kids sleep over. They had a blast. Was easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids, ages 2-8, think this is the best play item we've come up with recently. It is roomy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good tent, easy to put togheter baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: So it has been 2 months since I bought this for my toddler and still is like new, is well made durable something that you need with a toddler, I'm just waiting to be summer and take the tent outside so my baby can play in it, really happy with my purshase so far.
customer_reviews.author: julierearick_15

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, easy to set up, take down n store

customer_reviews.title: broken elastic in tent spoke.
customer_reviews.text: One of the tent spoke's elastic frayed and broke after just 4 uses! The elastic is frayed and almost broken in other places. Too much money for just 4 uses!!! This happened right after the 1 month return was up!!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschoolers to play in
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for preschoolers to play in! Can be used indoors or out. Very pleased with this!! Made well and sets up easily.

customer_reviews.title: Tent is easy to setup and remove
customer_reviews.text: Tent is easy to setup and remove. very light though, so think twice if you want to set it up in garden for kids.

customer_reviews.title: Great play tent
customer_reviews.text: Tent sets up quickly and can hold 2 kids and one (sitting) adult, while still fitting in a smaller room.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J Prawalsky

customer_reviews.title: Good little play tent for low price
customer_reviews.text: These tents are easy to set up and for the cost it's not a big deal if they don't last forever. If you are buying them for children 6 and under you will be happy with this purchase. Obviously these are not to be brought out in an actual camping situation, but for indoors/backyard adventures, this will most definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: RickBob

customer_reviews.title: Happy camping
customer_reviews.text: I sent this tent to my grandson for his birthday he was vert pleased
customer_reviews.author: Susan Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Good for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my visiting grandchildren. Two were able to sleep in it pretty comfortably. It folded up and went right back into the box for next time!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it 2 year old and 17 months where they keep there stuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice, my grandchildren have enjoyed many hours both ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect choice, my grandchildren have enjoyed many hours both outside and in the living room. Very easy to assemble and packs up rather quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up and big enough for several people to play inside.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Ives

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our 10 and 3 year old for Chritmas. They love to playou in it or chill with pillows and watch their tablets.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My twins took it to day camp for nap time : )

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and big enough for a couple kids to sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Y

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun idea to have grandkids sleep in inside the house!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson who is visiting for two weeks. (He's three weeks old) Also bought a toddler cot and put it in the tent. He was so excited he slept well for the entire stay and didn't get into anything in the guest room because he was so occupied in his tent.
customer_reviews.author: Roweboat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Withstood a rambunctious six year old over July 4th weekend. Easy to put up and nice quality. Did blow around the yard in the wind, ended up using metal tent stakes from an existing tent, would love if it came with kid-friendly plastic stakes to anchor it down.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this tent for my classroom. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent for my classroom. I use it to encourage my students to read. It is very roomy and well made. It wasn't too difficult to put together. I put a sleeping bag down inside to add some cushion for when they lay down to read. We have been using it for two months without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: William D Sims

customer_reviews.title: The description said it had two tunnel ports, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The description said it had two tunnel ports, but it has only one. I had it shipped to my grandson, so l have not checked the other details. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Aseltine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: my 2 year old grandson loves it! Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Frieda G. BAker

product_meta.title: Pacific Play Tents 41205 Kids Super Duper 4-Kid II Dome Tent Playhouse, 58" x 58" x 46"
product_meta.description:
Perfect for two moms and three kids the Pacific Play Tents Super Duper 4-Kid II Dome Tent has enough room for the whole gang. Designed especially large for added play value, and perfect for indoors or outdoors. This tent is made "kid tough" with a water proof floor, and Super Poles are safety-coated to prevent splintering or shattering. Also features a Velcro front door closure, and two 19" diameter tunnel ports with roll down flaps-tunnels sold separately. A full mesh top has been added for extra ventilation and easy viewing. Includes carry bag.

BRAND STORY
By Pacific Play Tents
feature_bullets: Tent size: 58" X 58" X 46" high, Mesh top-panels and windows, and a tunnel port with roll-up flaps
Large enough to accommodate three or more friends, toys and kid-sized furniture
Encourages physical play and stimulates the imagination at any time of the day, Vibrantly colored
190T 70 denier high quality Polyester taffeta prevents rips and tears, Super Poles are safety-coated to prevent splintering or shattering
